lines.content: Duke is a desktop application for task management, optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI). If you like typing, Duke is the perfect task management application for you. Duke can manage your todo tasks, deadlines and events quickly
1. Ensure you have Java 11 or above installed in your Computer.
3. Launch the program by double clicking the downloaded jar file, or run command java -jar Duke.jar .
4. Type the command and press 'Enter' on the keyboard to execute it.
5. Refer to Section 3, "Features" for details of each command.
* Command word is case-sensitive e.g. `todo` must be entered as `todo`.
* Words in UPPER_CASE are the parameters to be supplied by the user.
Shows the available commands, and their respective formats
Adds a 'todo' task to the task list.
Adds an 'event' to the task list.
Adds a 'deadline' to the task list.
Shows a list of tasks in the task list.
### 3.5b List all tasks filtered by date: `list DATE`
Shows a list of tasks filtered by date entered.
Deletes the specified task from the task list.
Marks the specified task from the task list as done.
Changes made to the task list will be automatically be saved to a txt file named `duke.txt`

System.out.println("    Hello there! Here are all the available commands and their respective formats:");
System.out.println("    To add a deadline: \"deadline {Name of task} /by {date} \"");
System.out.println("    To add an event: \"event {Name of task} /at {date} \" \");");
System.out.println("    To add an item in todo: \"todo {Name of task}\" ");
System.out.println("    To list out all tasks that you have entered: \"list\"");
System.out.println("    To filter task by date: \"list {date}\"");
System.out.println("    To mark a task as completed: \"done {index of task in list}\"");
System.out.println("    To delete a task: \"delete {index of task in list}\"");
System.out.println("    To find a task: \"find {keyword to be searched }\"");
